abstract: Day 4 of the contest, and we get a glimpse of how Patrick Berry sees the world.
snippet: Day 4 of the contest, and we get a glimpse of how Patrick Berry sees the world.
lead_paragraph: Administrivial Heads Up for Friday! The Friday, Oct. 21 crossword puzzle will be available at the normal time and place, but it will have a format that will not be available in Across Lite. However, we will be offering a PDF version that you will need to print out to solve. That version will be available here on Thursday, Oct. 20 at 10 p.m. Eastern time.

headline.main: Thursday: Day Four of the Crossword Contest
